description.english: An unexpected event forces Ari and Windstorm to flee from Kaltenbach Estate

description.english: Ari gets help from Sam and breaks into Kaltenbach Estate to find proof about Isabell's betrayal

displayName.german: Ein neuer Sheriff in der Stadt

description.english: Got Sheriff Kiesel to fully trust you
description.german: Du hast Oberwachtmeister Kiesels volles Vertrauen.
description.french: Tu as fait en sorte que le chef Kiesel te fasse pleinement confiance
description.italian: Hai conquistato la piena fiducia dell'ispettore capo Kiesel
description.spanish: Has conseguido que el sheriff Kiesel confíe en ti plenamente
description.danish: Fik hr. Kiesel til at have fuld tillid til dig
description.dutch: Zorg ervoor dat sheriff Kiezel je vertrouwt
description.finnish: Saa komisario Kiesel luottamaan sinuun täysin
description.norwegian: Fikk Kiesel til å stole hundre prosent på deg
description.latam: Has conseguido que el sheriff Kiesel confíe en ti plenamente

description.english: Shot 100 arrows
description.german: 100 Pfeile geschossen.
description.french: Tu as tiré 100 flèches
description.italian: Hai scoccato 100 frecce
description.spanish: Has disparado 100 flechas
description.danish: Affyr 100 pil
description.dutch: Schiet 100 pijlen af
description.norwegian: Skjøt 100 piler
description.latam: Has disparado 100 flechas

description.english: Completed the "Fast Falcon" challenge in under 105 seconds
description.german: „Schneller Falke”-Herausforderung in unter 105 Sekunden abgeschlossen.
description.french: Tu as terminé le défi du Faucon rapide en moins de 105 secondes
description.italian: Hai completato la sfida \"Falco lesto\" in meno di 105 secondi
description.spanish: Has superado el desafío del halcón rápido en menos de 105 segundos
description.danish: Gennemførte Den hurtige falkeudfordring på under 105 sekunder
description.dutch: Voltooi de uitdaging Snelle valk binnen 105 seconden
description.norwegian: Fullførte «Fast Falcon»-utfordringen på under 105 sekunder
description.swedish: Klarade utmaningen Snabba falken på mindre än 105 sekunder
description.latam: Has superado el desafío del halcón rápido en menos de 105 segundos

description.english: Fed apples to Windstorm and used the sprint boost for 600 seconds
description.german: Ostwind mit Äpfeln gefüttert und 600 Sekunden lang den Sprintschub benutzt.
description.french: Tu as nourri Whisper avec des pommes et utilisé le bonus d'endurance pour faire la course pendant 600 secondes
description.italian: Hai nutrito Windstorm con le mele e usato lo scatto per 600 secondi
description.spanish: Has dado manzanas a Windstorm, lo que le ha permitido esprintar durante 600 segundos
description.danish: Fodrede Stormy med æbler og boostede sprinten i 600 sekunder
description.dutch: Geef appels aan Stormwind en gebruik de booster Sprinten 600 seconden lang
description.finnish: Syötä Windstormille omenoita ja käytä kiitolaukan tehostetta 600 sekunnin ajan
description.norwegian: Ga epler til Windstorm og brukte spurtboost i 600 sekunder
description.swedish: Matade Windstorm med äpplen och använde rusningsboosten i 600 sekunder
description.latam: Has dado manzanas a Windstorm, lo que le ha permitido esprintar durante 600 segundos

description.english: Destroyed all billboards
description.german: Alle Werbetafeln zerstört.
description.french: Tu as détruis tous les panneaux publicitaires
description.italian: Hai distrutto tutti i cartelloni
description.spanish: Has destruido todos los carteles
description.danish: Ødelagde alle tavlerne
description.dutch: Alle reclameborden vernield
description.norwegian: Ødela alle plakatene
description.latam: Has destruido todos los carteles

description.english: Collected all band posters for Tinka
description.german: Alle Bandposter für Tinka gesammelt.
description.french: Tu as trouvé tous les posters de groupes pour Tinka
description.italian: Hai recuperato tutti i poster della band per Tinka
description.spanish: Has reunido todos los pósteres de la banda para Tinka
description.danish: Indsamlede alle bandplakater for Tinka
description.dutch: Alle posters verzameld voor Tinka
description.norwegian: Samlet alle bandplakatene for Tinka
description.latam: Has reunido todos los pósteres de la banda para Tinka

description.english: Solved all phone box riddles and reached the House of Enigma
description.german: Alle Telefonzellenrätsel gelöst und zum Haus der Rätsel gekommen.
description.french: Tu as résolu toutes les énimes des cabines téléphoniques et trouvé l'Antre aux énigmes
description.italian: Hai risolto tutti gli indovinelli delle cabine telefoniche e trovato la Dimora degli enigmi
description.spanish: Has resuelto todos los acertijos de las cabinas telefónicas y has llegado a la Casa de los Enigmas
description.danish: Løste alle telefonboks-gåderne og nåede til House of Enigma
description.dutch: Alle raadsels in de telefooncel opgelost en het Huis van wonderen bereikt
description.finnish: Selvitä kaikki puhelinkoppiarvoitukset ja pääse Arvoitusten taloon
description.norwegian: Løste alle telefonkioskgåtene og fant Gåtehuset
description.swedish: Löste alla telefonkioskgåtor och kom till det mystiska huset
description.latam: Has resuelto todos los acertijos de las cabinas telefónicas y has llegado a la Casa de los Enigmas

description.english: Earned the full trust of everyone
description.german: Du hast das volle Vertrauen von allen.
description.french: Tu as pleinement gagné la confiance de tout le monde
description.italian: Hai conquistato la piena fiducia di tutti
description.spanish: Has ganado la plena confianza de todo el mundo
description.danish: Opnåede alles fulde tillid
description.dutch: Het vertrouwen van iedereen verdiend
description.norwegian: Fikk alle til å stole hundre prosent på deg
description.latam: Has ganado la plena confianza de todo el mundo

description.english: Collected all scarecrow hats
description.german: Alle Vogelscheuchenhüte gesammelt.
description.french: Tu as collecté tous les chapeaux des épouvantails
description.italian: Hai recuperato tutti i cappelli degli spaventapasseri
description.spanish: Has reunido todos los sombreros de los espantapájaros
description.danish: Indsamlede alle fugleskræmslernes hatte
description.dutch: Alle vogelverschrikkershoeden verzameld
description.norwegian: Samlet alle fugleskremselhattene
description.latam: Has reunido todos los sombreros de los espantapájaros

description.english: Found all graffitti
description.german: Alle Graffitis gefunden.
description.french: Tu as trouvé tous les graffitis
description.italian: Hai trovato tutti i graffiti
description.spanish: Has encontrado todos los grafitis
description.danish: Fandt alle graffitier
description.dutch: Alle graffiti gevonden
description.norwegian: Fant alle graffitiene
description.latam: Has encontrado todos los grafitis
